course_title: Project-Based Language Learning for Chinese II (Streamlined)
course_description: This is the student project for the Spring 2024 MIT course {{% resource_link "831ccf30-220e-4e28-acfa-625d964c5360" "*21G.108 Chinese II (Streamlined)*" %}}. In the project, Chinese heritage language students explore various topics, including the meaning of their Chinese names. Based on their discoveries, each student creates an online book.
